title.narrative: South Sudan Standby Partnership – Programme Costs

description.narrative: This activity (South Sudan Standby Partnership – Programme Costs) is a component of Humanitarian Assistance and Resilience in South Sudan (HARISS) 2015 - 2022 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £2,740,632. This component benefits South Sudan, and works in the following sector(s): Relief co-ordination and support services. , with the following implementing partners: CANADEM, Centre for Humanitarian Dialogue, Crown Agents Limited, Danish Refugee Council, Norwegian Refugee Council, Palladium International Ltd (UK), RedR, World Food Programme (WFP). The start date is 01-04-2014 and the end date is 31-05-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
